CmdLine: apk update ;       apk add           apache2-utils           ca-certificates           mariadb-client           openssl           libpng-dev           libpng-utils           libpng           imagemagick           php7           php7-common           php7-apcu           php7-amqp           php7-bcmath           php7-bz2           php7-calendar           php7-ctype           php7-curl           php7-dba           php7-dom           php7-embed           php7-enchant           php7-exif           php7-fileinfo           php7-fpm           php7-ftp           php7-gd           php7-gettext           php7-gmp           php7-iconv           php7-imagick           php7-imagick-dev           php7-imap           php7-intl           php7-json           php7-ldap           php7-mailparse           php7-mbstring           php7-mcrypt           php7-memcached           php7-mysqli           php7-mysqlnd           php7-odbc           php7-opcache           php7-openssl           php7-pcntl           php7-pdo           php7-pdo_mysql           php7-pdo_pgsql           php7-pdo_sqlite           php7-pgsql           php7-phar          php7-posix           php7-pspell           php7-recode           php7-redis           php7-session           php7-shmop           php7-simplexml           php7-snmp           php7-soap           php7-sockets           php7-sqlite3           php7-tidy           php7-tokenizer           php7-wddx           php7-xdebug           php7-xml           php7-xmlreader           php7-xmlrpc           php7-xmlwriter           php7-xml           php7-zip           php7-zlib           php7-zmq           ;             rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* ;             sed -i 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/g' /etc/php7/php.ini ;       ln -s /sbin/php-fpm7 /sbin/php-fpm ;             curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- --install-dir=/usr/bin --filename=composer ;             mkdir -p /www/logs
